basic.floral_language:
Kalanchoe tomentosa 
Floriography: lovely, gentle, tenacious
Panda Plants are meaty plants, the shape of leaves mimics rabbit's ear. Meaty leaves are of good number, pale color with numerous white trichomes. Leaves show dark brown edge when exposed to strong sun light. Panda plants like sunshine, doing ok with half shading time. Enter short dormancy when hot in summer, recover in the shade. Flowering in June and July with pale pink flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray white, when sunny leaf tips with brown marks

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, and resistant to half shade, short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly 2 times during summer dormancy, keep soil moist in other time, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
